DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find undercorrection myopia slow progression myopia kindergarten child .
DOC.brief_title: Does Undercorrection Myopia Retard Myopia Progression Among Kindergarten Children ?
DOC.criteria: 1 . Children chinese descent age 5 6yrs 2 . Refractive error 1.00 3.00Ds 3 . Less 1.50 astigmatism eye . ( No oblique axis ) 4 . Visual acuity 6/6 good eye . 5 . No binocular problem , anisometropia > 1.50D 6 . Will stay S'pore least 2 year .
